product_summary: Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API is a cloud-based solution that allows developers to integrate facial recognition into their applications. It offers a range of features including age and gender detection, face verification, emotion detection, and liveness detection. The API is easy to use and can be integrated with a variety of programming languages.
product_cons: May not be suitable for high-security applications
May not be able to recognize faces in all lighting conditions

product_usecases.details: Use Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API to create an attendance system that uses facial recognition to track employee time and attendance.
Use Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API to verify the identity of customers during onboarding and transactions.
Use Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API to detect fraud by identifying imposters and preventing unauthorized access.
Use Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API to control access to buildings, rooms, and other secure areas.
Use Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API to verify the age of customers for age-restricted products and services.

product_toolfor.details: Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API is designed for developers who want to add facial recognition capabilities to their applications.
Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API can be used by businesses of all sizes to improve security, efficiency, and customer experience.
Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API can be used by government agencies for a variety of purposes, such as law enforcement, border control, and national security.
Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API can be used by researchers to develop new and innovative applications of facial recognition technology.
Luxand.Cloud's Facial Recognition API can be used by educators to teach students about facial recognition technology and its applications.
